World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 29 日星期一 21:33:01 GMT 120
Peru protests block access to Machu Picchu, stranding touristsProtests in Peru are blocking access to Machu Picchu, one of South America's most popular heritage sites, with local anger over a new ticketing system halting rail transport to the iconic Incan site and leaving some tourists stranded. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 21:22:48 GMT 3XIMATKAAVMKBIUULBTNK7PI3A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/peru-protests-block-access-machu-picchu-stranding-tourists-2024-01-29/Lucinda Elliott世界美洲
EU envoys back setting aside Russian asset profits for UkraineEuropean Union members agreed unanimously on Monday to set aside billions of euros of windfall profits from Russian central bank assets frozen in Europe, the first step of a plan to help fund Ukraine reconstruction after Russia's invasion. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 20:39:04 GMT 2PUZK7DJKBOZXD7LTUR23ORMGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-envoys-back-setting-aside- Russian-asset-profits-ukraine-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
ECOWAS chair Nigeria slams juntas' move to quit blocNigeria on Monday said the "unelected" military authorities in Niger, Mali, and Burkina Faso were letting their people down with their joint decision to leave the Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS). Mon, 29 Jan 2024 19:47:56 GMT BBLOUZKUBBO3DNZHT4DWSOCTDM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/mali-notizes-west-african-bloc-ecowas-decision-leave-2024-01-29/Reuters世界非洲
Brazil state prosecutor urges Vale, BHP to settle over dam disasterMiners Vale , BHP and their joint venture, Samarco, should strike a deal to compensate for a deadly dam disaster in 2015 or risk paying a lot more in court, the Minas Gerais state prosecutor general told Reuters. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 19:46:01 GMT Y34OSBJWFVIV5D7V4ME5XFX44A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-state-prosecutor-urges-vale-bhp-settle-over-dam-disaster-2024-01-29/Marta Nogueira世界美洲
Israel's military keeps focus on southern Gaza's Khan Younis -spokespersonIsrael's military said on Monday it will keep pressure on the city of Khan Younis in the southern Gaza Strip, which for weeks has been the focus of Israel's offensive, and said it has killed more than 2,000 Palestinian militants there. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 19:20:59 GMT SCU7HV3ATNP4XECAHCCSZZNHIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israels-military-keeps-focus-southern-gazas-khan-younis-spokesperson-2024-01-29/Reuters世界中东
Qatar hopes US retaliation won't undercut hostage talksQatar's prime minister on Monday said he hoped U.S. retaliation for an attack that killed three U.S. troops in Jordan would not undercut progress toward a new Israel-Hamas hostage release deal in weekend talks. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 18:41:22 GMT BKMMK4OKYZIIHP5Q3BXUE7XUOI https://www.reuters.com/world/qatar-hopes-us-retaliation-wont-undercut-hostage-talks-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Asylum-seekers' limbo at Madrid airport 'unsustainable' -rights groupsSeveral hundred migrants seeking asylum are in limbo at Madrid airport, sleeping in crammed spaces with poor conditions, Spanish rights groups said, describing the situation as "unsustainable". Mon, 29 Jan 2024 18:33:11 GMT VN6K7AVQSFKXRH2E4EZ6TVFTIA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/asylum-seekers-limbo-madrid-airport-unsustainable-rights-groups-2024-01-29/Reuters世界欧洲
About 30 killed in Mali in weekend village attacksAbout 30 people were killed in attacks on two villages in central Mali over the weekend, the rural commune's mayor said on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 18:12:07 GMT MZ2BIPZAMRJPXCFLGKMZUR4CRM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/about-30-killed-mali-weekend-village-attacks-2024-01-29/Reuters世界非洲
US to reinstate oil sanctions on Venezuela if opposition candidate barred, White House saysThe U.S. will reinstate sanctions on Venezuela's oil sector if the Venezuelan government does not lift its ban on a leading opposition candidate running for president later this year, a White House official said on Monday. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 18:06:52 GMT PZUSMIJUOVLQTGAJJ7LKC6KTWI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuelas-machado-rejects-possibility-substitute-opposition-candidate-2024-01-29/Matt Spetalnick, Vivian Sequera世界美洲
South Africa's ruling ANC suspends membership of ex-leader ZumaSouth Africa's ruling African National Congress (ANC) said on Monday it had suspended the membership of former president Jacob Zuma after he announced he would vote for another party in this year's general election. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 17:55:41 GMT ORLQG73A5RM75OBHX2M4D6FZ7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/south-africas-ruling-anc-suspends-membership-ex-leader-zuma-2024-01-29/Nellie Peyton世界非洲
Palestinians in Gaza see UNRWA funding cuts as 'death sentence'Palestinian mother Mazouza Hassan stood aghast at the potential threats to the work of the U.N. agency that handles most aid in Gaza after some Western states suspended funding to it over allegations employees took part in the Hamas attack on Israel. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 17:08:56 GMT DH6CAHHZ7RMQXJERG2NT2QFEOY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinians-gaza-see-unrwa-funding-cuts-death-sentence-2024-01-29/Fadi Shana, Ibraheemabu Mustafa世界中东
